issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:

fields.summary: TPCDS query 19 runs throws NPE in VectorizedParquetRecordReader initializing tables partition info

comments.body: Other TPCDS queries having the same issue - 42, 52, 55, 68, 73 and 17.
This may be duplicate of HIVE-17961 or HIVE-15718. Hi [~ndembla] Can you specify the version where you see this exception?
[~vihangk1] Version - Hive 3.0. I don't have the fix for HIVE-17961 in my build.
It doesn't look related to cache in particular... can you try with that fix? or disable cache.
